verses.text: \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Arad|strong="H6166"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Chanaanite, \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* towards \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* wit, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* spies, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w them|strong="H7617"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* overcoming \w them|strong="H7617"\w* \w carried|strong="H7617"\w* \w off|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* spoils.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* binding \w himself|strong="H3027"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w It|strong="H5414"\w* thou wilt \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* utterly \w destroy|strong="H2763"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* prayers \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Chanaanite, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* cut \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w off|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* destroyed \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* Horma, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H6963"\w*, Anathema.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w marched|strong="H5437"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hor|strong="H2023"\w*, \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* leadeth \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Red \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w to|strong="H1870"\w* compass \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*. \w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* began \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* weary \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H1870"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* labour:

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* didst thou \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H4100"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*? \w There|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w nor|strong="H0369"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H0369"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*: \w our|strong="H0430"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w* loatheth \w this|strong="H3588"\w* very light \w food|strong="H3899"\w*.

Wherefore \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w among|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* fiery \w serpents|strong="H5175"\w*, which bit \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w killed|strong="H4191"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w Upon|strong="H5921"\w* which \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thee: \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w serpents|strong="H5175"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Make|strong="H7760"\w* brazen serpent, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* sign: whosoever \w being|strong="H1961"\w* struck \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* live.

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w therefore|strong="H4872"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* brazen \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* sign: which \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* bitten \w looked|strong="H5027"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w*, \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* healed.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w setting|strong="H5265"\w* forwards \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w Oboth|strong="H0088"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* departing thence \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* tents \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Jeabarim, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* faceth \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w east|strong="H4217"\w*.
\w And|strong="H8033"\w* removing \w from|strong="H5265"\w* thence, \w they|strong="H8033"\w* came \w to|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* torrent Zared:

\w Which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* over \w against|strong="H2583"\w* \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* standeth \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w on|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Amorrhite. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, dividing \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Amorrhites.

Wherefore \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wars|strong="H4421"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w did|strong="H3651"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Red Sea, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* do \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w streams|strong="H5158"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Amen.

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* rocks \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* torrents \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w bowed|strong="H5186"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w might|strong="H0834"\w* \w rest|strong="H8172"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Ar|strong="H6144"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* lie \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w*.

\w When|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* went \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w well|strong="H0875"\w* appeared whereof \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: \w Gather|strong="H0622"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sung|strong="H7891"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*: Let \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w well|strong="H0875"\w* \w spring|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*. \w They|strong="H0875"\w* \w sung|strong="H7891"\w* thereto:

\w The|strong="H5971"\w* \w well|strong="H0875"\w*, which \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w dug|strong="H2658"\w*, \w and|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w chiefs|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* prepared by \w the|strong="H5971"\w* direction \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w lawgiver|strong="H2710"\w*, \w and|strong="H8269"\w* \w with|strong="H2710"\w* their staves. \w And|strong="H8269"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* marched \w from|strong="H2710"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w to|strong="H0875"\w* Mathana.
From Mathana unto \w Nahaliel|strong="H5160"\w*: from \w Nahaliel|strong="H5160"\w* unto \w Bamoth|strong="H1120"\w*.

\w From|strong="H5921"\w* \w Bamoth|strong="H1120"\w*, \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w country|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* Phasga, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w looked|strong="H8259"\w* towards \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w desert|strong="H3452"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Sehon \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Amorrhites, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* beseech thee \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* leave \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* \w into|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w wells|strong="H0875"\w*, \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w kingâ€™s|strong="H4428"\w* \w highway|strong="H1870"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* past thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w should|strong="H3478"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w rather|strong="H3808"\w* \w gathering|strong="H0622"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w army|strong="H5971"\w*, \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Jasa, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w* unto \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Jeboc, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* confines \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H5983"\w*, \w were|strong="H3478"\w* kept \w with|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w strong|strong="H5794"\w* garrison.

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Amorrhite, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* wit, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Hesebon, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w villages|strong="H1323"\w* thereof.

Hesebon \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Sehon \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Amorrhites, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* dominions, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* proverb: \w Come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* Hesebon, \w let|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Sehon \w be|strong="H5511"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w set|strong="H3559"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w*:

\w A|strong="H3588"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* \w gone|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1167"\w* Hesebon, \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w flame|strong="H3852"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w* \w of|strong="H1167"\w* Sehon, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* hath \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* \w Ar|strong="H6144"\w* \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* inhabitants \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*.
